start_boss.text: Avert your eyes from your lord!
I consume entire worlds. You are no different.

retreat.text: You live because I allow it.

engaged.text: There is no place to hide.
I want you to suffer to your last, fool.

pursuing.text: That one will bow to my will.

hull_90.text: Your strategy is amusing at best.

hull_50.text: This battle is causing me damage!
This plan must change before I suffer further!

hull_30.text: These attacks are taking their toll.
The end of my reign is at hand!

overload.text: My genius will cause your mind to implode.

death.text: I am dying! This cannot be!

victory.text: I have such sights to show you.
Where I go, my enemies fall.
NOTHING WILL STAND IN MY WAY!

victory_boss.text: The difference between insanity and genius, is success!
